TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TrackBarRenderer extends System.Object

summary.span: Provides methods used to render a track bar control with visual styles.

span.span: Provides methods used to render a track bar control with visual styles.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供一組`static`可以用來呈現之追蹤列控制項的每個部分，與作業系統的目前視覺化樣式的方法。The class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render each part of a track bar control with the current visual style of the operating system. 呈現控制項是指繪製控制項的使用者介面。Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control. 這非常有用，如果要繪製自訂控制項應該具有目前視覺化樣式的外觀。This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should have the appearance of the current visual style. 如果已在作業系統中啟用視覺化樣式和視覺化樣式套用至應用程式視窗的工作區，此類別中的方法將會繪製追蹤列的目前視覺化樣式。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows, the methods in this class will draw the track bar with the current visual style. 否則，此類別中的方法會擲回。Otherwise, the methods in this class will throw an . 若要判斷是否可以使用這個類別的成員，您可以檢查的值屬性。To determine whether the members of this class can be used, you can check the value of the property. 這個類別會包裝的功能設定為其中一個所公開的項目類別。This class wraps the functionality of a that is set to one of the elements exposed by the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 呈現具有視覺化樣式的控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立自訂控制項，以便使用繪製回應按下滑鼠的水平追蹤列的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control that uses the methods to draw a horizontal track bar that responds to mouse clicks. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer/VB/form1.vb#0)]
